mapper.select: select file_seq , post_id , file_name , file_type , encode_file_name , directory_path from file_info where post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: insert into file_info (post_id, file_name, file_type, encode_file_name, directory_path) VALUES (#{postId},#{fileName},#{fileType},#{encodeFileName},#{directoryPath})
